chunks.chunk_text: to go and try and see if you can stand your egg at noon todayAnd also maybe go find some noon water for you guysI hear it's good for feng shui and good for healthSo give it a try and have a great day with your familyBut today we will still continue with our shadowing activityThis is our regular practice every MondaySo whether or not you're celebrating today doesn't matterLet's take the next 15 minutes and read this article overAnd you can shadow it again with me
